profile: An accomplished Commercial Director with a strong track record of driving profitable growth across CPG branded and own-label businesses. Skilled in leading high-performing teams across Sales, Demand Planning and NPD. Combining data-driven insight with innovative problem-solving to deliver measurable, sustainable results in competitive, fast-evolving markets.

careerHistory.title: Commercial Director — UK & Ireland
points: Led Sales, NPD and Demand Planning functions; 30 internal colleagues and numerous external stakeholders.
Delivered consistent YOY volume and value growth ahead of market, driving revenue from £335m (2022) to £533m (2024), with 2025 projected at £575m.
Developed and executed a 5-year commercial strategy spanning core growth, channel and category expansion, regional expansion, M&A opportunities and brand development.
Created new commercial ways of working across three key functions — improving alignment, operational efficiency and customer relationships.
Regular commercial reporting to Private Equity shareholders, ensuring strategic alignment to business objectives.

careerHistory.title: Customer Development Director — UK & Ireland
points: Key leadership team member across Retail and Foodservice divisions, working cross-functionally with Marketing, Category and Operations.
Led Sales and Demand Planning teams, delivering market share growth in UK & Ireland, volume and value growth while optimising commercial investment.
Delivered best-in-class customer engagement, contributing significantly to proposition development, category initiatives and Brand Plan delivery.
